cumulative.translation[0].definitions[0]: increasing gradually as more of something is added or happens
Depression is often caused by the cumulative effects of stress and overwork.
cumulative.translation[1].definitions[0]: increasing gradually and having a greater effect as more is added over a period of time
The state is already saddled with a cumulative deficit of about $73 million.
The company faces cumulative losses approaching $7 billion.
